```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE)
library(vitae)
library(rorcid)
library(tibble)
library(scholar)
library(tidyverse)
library(pkgsearch)
```




```{r, include = FALSE}

# Marie Curie Nobel Prizes

tribble(
  ~Year, ~Type, ~Desc,
  1903, "Physics", "Awarded for her work on radioactivity with Pierre Curie and Henri Becquerel",
  1911, "Chemistry", "Awarded for the discovery of radium and polonium"
) %>% 
  vitae::brief_entries(
    Type,
    Year, 
    Desc
  )
```

# R Packages

```{r rpkgs}

pkgsearch::pkg_search("datos Traduce al", size = 100) %>%
  filter(package == "datos")  %>%

  brief_entries(
    what = paste(package, title, sep = ": "),
    when = lubridate::year(date),
    with = paste(downloads_last_month, " downloads last month",  sep = ""),
  )


```

# Publications



```{r}

scholar::get_publications("_bVy9pMAAAAJ&hl")  %>% 
  drop_na(year) %>%
  arrange(desc(year)) %>%
  mutate(author = gsub("\\...", "et al.", author)) %>%
  vitae::detailed_entries(
    what = title,
    when = year,
    with = author,
    where = journal, 
    .protect = TRUE
  )

```
